p: Hypertension and myocardial injury are often treated with inhibitors of the renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system (RAAS) which may elevate the levels of the ACE2 receptor. Recent reports suggest that myocardial injury is related with the SARS-CoV-2. Figure 4 shows ultrastructure features of a heart sample from a patient with COVID-19 postmortem showing the presence of the virus. However, in comparison the Figure 5 shows the ultrastructure of a heart sample as control subject without viral particles.
